channel.title: How come when i
channel.description:
how come when i download any client to play on a server it'll load up fine, but when i click logg in this always happens, it laggs completely and says connection has been lost, logs me in and out nonstop, or loads up the screen but the playing screen is just black
i have the latest java, so what else could it be?
also the servers i go on are all 24/7 and other people are on them too

item.title: How come when i

item.description:
@anti-crime wrote:

yeah i have the ones they make you download

Read full topic
